channel.title: Orange Hotpot's personal blog
channel.description: Recent content on Orange Hotpot's personal blog

item.title: First Personalblog
item.description: PS： Install Hugo chick here Create a New Site hugo new site quickstart Add a Theme Hugo Themes cd quickstart git init git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke echo 'theme = "ananke"' >> config.toml Add Some Content hugo new posts/my-first-post.md Start the Hugo server [chick here]（http://localhost:1313/） hugo server -D Customize the Theme site Configuration code config.toml Build static pages hugo -D
